snippet: Adis Medunjanin, a naturalized citizen from Bosnia, is accused of plotting to bomb subways with two friends from Queens after being trained by Al Qaeda.
abstract: Prosecutors, lawyers and witnesses offer opening arguments in trial of Adis Medunjanin, naturalized citizen from Bosnia who is accused of plotting to bomb New York City subways with two friends from Queens after being trained by Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: Adis Medunjanin, a naturalized citizen from Bosnia, is accused of plotting to bomb subways with two friends from Queens after being trained by Al Qaeda.

headline.seo: Witness in Terror Trial Details Subway Attack Plan
headline.main: Witness Details Plot to Attack Subways
headline.print_headline: Witness Details Plot to Attack Subways
